remarks: Linear independence is unchanged by working in a subspace.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
lsslindf.u $e |- U = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lsslindf.x $e |- X = ( W |`s S ) $.
lsslindf $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ S e. U /\ ran F C_ S ) -> ( F LIndF X <-> F LIndF W ) ) $.
